## TNode.from() method

Construct a TNode and all its children from a serialized object (most likely from the `TNode.$.serialize` method)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static from(serialized: SerializedTNode, parent?: TNode): TNode<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  serialized | [SerializedTNode](./static-tree.serializedtnode.md) | a [SerializedTNode](./static-tree.serializedtnode.md) object |
|  parent | [TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> a [TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md) parent to attach to |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md)<!-- -->&lt;any&gt;

node [TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md)
